title: ~speedx~
author: ~speedx~
content: After 10month later btc again touch 30k range, Although I was happy to see it rise to the range of 30k, but a deep pain and fear was created in my chest, actually the fear is that I don't feel comfort when the price of bitcoin goes higher because after investing at that price, if btc's value goes down. It's like the bitcoin pump couldn't make me happy. I would like to know your feelings on this matter.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: i've reached a point in my bitcoin journey..where i don't even look up the price anymore.invest only what u can afford to lose is the golden rule.follow that and let the universe do the rest.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: It’s a usual feeling if it were a regular or someone that is already a pro but for a newbie it is panicking. You don’t need to be scared to actually invest in at any price except maybe you’re putting an amount that could get in to trouble when it falls. Invest what is losable at any price and for a lesser risk it is advisable to use the DCA strategy.30k is just 47% of the ATH so there’s no need to look at this price thinking it is that high who knows we might be seeing a new ATH closer to 100k or even higher and that will be 3x what you will be investing now.

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Quote from: ~speedx~ on April 11, 2023, 03:23:31 PMAfter 10month later btc again touch 30k range, Although I was happy to see it rise to the range of 30k, but a deep pain and fear was created in my chest, actually the fear is that I don't feel comfort when the price of bitcoin goes higher because after investing at that price, if btc's value goes down. It's like the bitcoin pump couldn't make me happy. I would like to know your feelings on this matter.   After the price of Bitcoin cleared $25k many predicted that the price of Bitcoin would dump higher again and Bitcoin could fall to $10-12k.  However, Bitcoin broke through that barrier to $30K today, indicating that the possibility of a Bitcoin dump is now very low. Those who invested when the price of Bitcoin was low were very lucky.  They are now in good profit. Bitcoin prices are likely to reach their previous ATH this year.  But it could happen by the end of the year. But its sampling has already started. Many people, including myself, are very happy and excited to see such a positive side of Bitcoin

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Happy because businesses in crypto especially the project that I’m promoting will have a better income for the sustainability of the business promotion that will benefit me in the long run. Also all my crypto holdings that I purchased since January is growing on insane percentage without noticing it until now after opening my hardware wallet for long time.Breaking and staying at 30K is an important milestone for Bitcoin to reach for more high. But we should not celebrate prematurely because the price can dump very quickly once Bitcoin failed hold on this important level. E

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: If this bullish trend persists then the Bitcoin price will easily exceed 35K. The upward movement to 30K was a certainty and I pray that 35K is also not too far off. The attention of everyone is now focused on Bitcoin which is a clear indication of its current growth. The trend is in favor of Bitcoin this time and if it continues then we will be left astonished by the Bitcoin price in the coming days.Let's suppose that if the Bitcoin price crosses its all-time high in the coming months. It will bring  a significant change in the crypto market. That change will attract thousands of new investors towards Bitcoin and crypto world which will ultimately cause a massive Bull market in altcoins.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: No need to be hurt if you buy at a high price, basically bitcoin has always had a good cycle in its history and after the halving it is always predicted that the price will reach ATH, there is still hope that the bitcoin price will be bullish again in the next few years, you also there is no need to worry if holding in bitcoin it remains an asset that will be profitable too if it lasts for a long time.We are happy to have broken through $30,000 of course this can be considered the start of the recovery phase for the next, but our hope is not to go up too fast while we are still collecting at lower prices, the market is now showing a positive trend and there are usually several factors that make the price appreciate again.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: No huge feelings though, because I was actually expecting the 30k anytime soon. It's those who are day traders who will actually enjoy this kind of pump, especially those who hold more than 0.5 BTC and bought it at $27k+. Waking up to see 30k this morning is going to affect their profit feelings differently. This 30K break is an example that we are going to see more height in the coming days. Based on all the discussion I read through under speculation, this is already foreseen.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: At $30k, I would say the feeling is as usual. This is a coin that has hit an ATH of $69k so there's no special feeling but we will get there. It's just have about a year for bitcoin halving, and I'm looking forward to the bull run to kick in then the feeling would be special seeing green candles and possibly an ATH.

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: You care too much or you invested amounts you should have not.  You know the investment is healthy when you are excited to invest more in bear days and mostly stay active during bull days.  If you are so afraid of losing the investment.  It means you should invest less.  Enough to be at peace with the investment but not so much you are scared of losing.Or it may be that I just have more experience and went through so many bear markets I simply do not care any more.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Yesterday I sold off 0.008 bitcoin for the fear that bitcoin would come down again. In the morning, yesterday bitcoin was $28+ and towards the afternoon period bitcoin was coming down again to $27- so I was afraid that it would come down to $20k again so with that fear I sold it off though not all but to pay bills. But waking up this morning to see that bitcoin was $30k, I was shocked and excited. And I also have the mode of regret which I said to myself that if I wished I kept it till today. That is why having the fear to invest in bitcoin is very bad. Always have the confidence and faith in the investment. Those who don't have faith always loss out and regret later.
